commands.name: bind
commands.description: Bind you Discord account with your Genshin UID

description_localizations.zh-CN: 将您的Discord帐号与原神的UID绑定
description_localizations.ja: あなたの原神のUIDとDiscordのアカウントをバインドする

options.name: uid
options.description: UID of your Genshin Impact Account

commands.name: lookup
commands.description: Look up something about your account

description_localizations.zh-CN: 查询有关您的帐号的信息
description_localizations.ja: あなたのアカウントについて情報を検索する

commands.name: setlanguage
commands.description: Set your own bot answer language

description_localizations.zh-CN: 设置您的机器人回答语言
description_localizations.ja: あなたのボット返事言語を設定する
